targets.query:
from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> drop(columns:["connectome"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "neuron")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "membrane_potential" and r["src_cortical_area"] =~ /^${src_cortical_area:regex}$/ )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["voxel_x"] =~ /^${vox_x:regex}$/ and r["voxel_y"] =~ /^${vox_y:regex}$/ and r["voxel_z"] =~ /^${vox_z:regex}$/ )
  |> drop(columns:["voxel_x", "voxel_y", "voxel_z"])
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Neuron")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "src_cortical_area",
    predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "neuron",
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Source Cortical Area
list.name: src_cortical_area
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "src_cortical_area",
    predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "neuron",
    start: -1d
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "dst_cortical_area",
    predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "synapse",
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Destination Cortical Area
list.name: dst_cortical_area
list.query:

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "voxel_x",
    predicate: (r) =>  r["src_cortical_area"] =~ /^${src_cortical_area:regex}$/ or r["dst_cortical_area"] =~ /^${dst_cortical_area:regex}$/,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: X Voxel
list.name: vox_x
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"

    start: -1d
)
